div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1327 Yesilhisar environs, near Savastepe (anc. Ceraseis), Mysia, 1963 Burial: 130 B.C. (Kleiner) Contents: 104 AR Cistophori: Pergamum 37, Ephesus 33 (to yr. 4), Sardes 2, Tralles 19, Apameia 8, Laodiceia 1 Disposition: Istanbul 100 Oçlay, Istanbul ArkMüzYilligi 1964, pp. 58-63 (Turkish), 171-7 (English). Nos. 30-37, 69-70 and 91 are intrusions To be published by F. Kleiner
